content:
196 
 
    (vi) EKSU and UYO accept Proficiency Certificate in 
French. UYO accepts Proficiency Certificate in 
French from University of UYO and certificate in 
French from the Alliance Fanҫaise.  
(vii) IBADAN accepts five (5) or six (6) 'O' level credit 
passes at one (1) or two (2) sittings to include 
Literature in English and other Arts and Social 
Science subjects.  
(viii) ILORIN accepts Social Science subjects.  Also 
accepts candidates who did not offer Frenc h at 
UTME but meet the UTME requirements.  
(ix) KASU accepts only subjects from the Arts or 
Social Sciences.  
(x) KWASU requires three (3) other Arts subjects.  
(xi) LAGOS requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in 
Mathematics, English Language and any other 
three ( 3 ) subjects from the Arts or Social 
Sciences. Civic Education and Computer Studies 
are also accepted.  
(xii) NASARAWA accepts NCE merit pass in French.  
(xiii) OAU – ‘O’ level credit pass in French is not 
compulsory.  
(xiv) UMYUK accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes or 
its equivalent in English Language, French, and 
any other three (3) Artsor Social Science subjects 
and ‘O’ level credit pass in Mathematics at not 
more than two (2) sittings.  
(xv) UNIOSUN requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes 
or its equivalent in English Language, 
Government or History and any other three (3) 
subjects.  
(xvi) UNIZIK accepts five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes to 
include English Language, French and two (2) 
other Arts subjects and one (1) Social Science 
subject.   
 
REQUIREMENTS
